column5: MYO Made by peace with it Sold 14k stocks for a loss at 095 cents last Friday lost around 21600 I cant take this crap messing my days anymore It might go up it might go down right now with 12k remaining money saved is money earned I will probably put 12k towards something more reasonable and try to gain it back Dont pour water in sand My prediction is it will reach 50 cents in some weeks unless someone pumps it up Not worth for me Burn in Hell MYO
MYO ouch how low can you go
MYO Basket case or should I say case study66 down after avg down twiceamazing POS

MYO hmmm perhaps a partnership with chinas Ryzur medical that could very interesting Myomo will participate in this event together with Beijing Ryzur Medical Investment Co Ltd Ryzur Medical a growing medical device manufacturer based in Beijing HUGE market possibilities yes im trying to project positive vibes here

MYO I almost did it Averaged down and then I thought why keep feeding the stock that has given me 78 Strategy has changed hold until I can hopefully minimize my loss But I wont be putting more money in here
